reviews.review: Juegoo este juego desde diciembre de 2016, y siempre termino volviendo, porque es un juego unico, no hay otro parecido ni nada, por eso quiero recomendar este juego a cualquier persona q dude en comprarlo o no.
El juego alegra mi corazÃ³n cada dia
Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ°Ñ  Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ñ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ·ÑŒÑĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ„Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ. Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ ÑĞºĞ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ

DBD does not give out a good first impression. you'll load into your first game and you'll not have a clue what to do. you'll get dumpstered and you will want to quit, uninstall and thats that.
However..... give it a chance. learn it, get used to the mechanics and it is hella fun.
it's grindy. theres a lot of perks in the game, most of the good ones are on DLC characters. you can get these perks from the shrine of secrets without paying for the dlc but only 3 perks a week are on the shrine and they cost alot of ingame currency (non Premium) to get, but it's hella fun.
the community is toxic af so if you are easily offended it might not be for you. you can turn the chat box off in the settings though. look at my profile comments if you want to see how toxic it is. one guy actually wished terminal illness on my future children just because i beat him. but it's hella fun.

DBD at its core is a great game. my problem is purely with its business model and its community. if you want access to all the perks in the game it is expensive and time consuming. we are talking 1000+ hours of bloodpoint grinding. but it is Hella fun! and despite all the negatives i still recommend trying this game.
Most toxic and unbalance game ever,but atmosphere of this game is amazing!
its a super fun game and i just love it
Great game both solo and with friends.  Highly recommend!
Excelente jogo de pique-esconde! Boas horas de diversÃ£o.

After the developers have made some updates to the game, I am changing my review. While there are still prevailing issues with the game, it is overall better. Visually, the game feels more modern. The balance is better and I am enjoying the game more. It is not perfect, but I now recommend buying the game.
do not buy this game if you do not want to get diagnosed with anger issues and depression
jogo muito divertido e asssustador ainda mais se vier um mayrs de espelho
Best game of Hide & Seek I know of.

Super jeux qui vous rappellera tous les super moments ou Jean-random se faisait voler son Pitch par 4 jean-bully au lycÃ©e.
Certes ils n'avaient pas de Flashlights ou de palettes en bois mais justement, dans ce jeu, vous pourrez vivre ca dans une ambiance """horrifique""" qui fait kro kro peur.
Ce jeux est genial si vous n'avez pas un balai plus gros que la queue de manu dans le sandwichs, sinon on pourra toujours vous retrouver chez les producteurs de sel Francais Ã  vous demander pourquoi le jeux est fini Ã  la pisse.
Je recommande Ã  tous les mecs chill qui aiment les jeux asymÃ©triques et egalement au fans de jeux d'horreurs car je vous aime krÃ© krÃ© fort ;)
Si je vous vois in game je vous ferais des bisous sur la fesse gauche sinon je vous souhaite de ne jamais croiser de team tryhard Ã  moins d'avoir un mental d'acier et de ne pas avoir la corde sur le tabouret Ã  cotÃ© de vous.

Forget about "balance" and "fun" when buying this game.
I really don't recommend this piece of crap if you don't have friends to play with.
At least you can rage together.

Very interesting and unique game. From the start it was really good after release of the new killers it's not as fun as it used to be. Killers are too OP and some are really not fun to play against but i understand that they can't let the game be stuck at one point because it will eventually become boring. I would not recommend to buy this game if you don't have any friends to play with but if you have even one friend that will play with you it is absolutely worth buying. The progression system is done very well and really pulls you into the game. It's very rewarding and also the RNG element feels really nice. There is a variety of characters to play for  and especially the killers offer an absolutely different play-style so even if you don't like some you will find others very fun to play for. Survivors are lame to play as if you are playing solo because the communication aspect is the key to being good and actually having fun so you have to have at least one other survivor who is your friend and call through something because the game unfortunately doesn't has a voice chat. Overall this game is a lot of fun and there is a big skill gap you can reach so even tryhards won't get bored right away.
